title: The Midnight Gala Heist
description: During a lavish midnight gala at the city museum, a priceless diamond vanishes from a locked display case. The only people with access were VIP guests and staff. The security system was briefly disabled during a power flicker.

A.name: The Famous Actress
A.description: Seen near the display just before the lights went out.

B.name: The Tech Billionaire
B.description: Known for hacking devices. Had access to security schematics.

C.name: The Museum Curator
C.description: Possesses master keys to the entire museum.

D.name: The Retired Thief
D.description: Claimed to be 'just a guest' but has a criminal past.

E.name: The Security Guard
E.description: Left his post for 5 minutes around the time of the theft.
